Note: Followed by 971, 4350, 140 in a Latin sermon by Friar Nicholas Philipp preached in 1431.
Subjects: sermons, verse in; love, divine and human; lover’s lament
_description: A quatrain on love — two couplets

BodLatTheD1.Transcription:
Lowe is loken vnder groundeEnwye lowe hathe I-boundelowe is lore
                    at þe criageore lowe is wente on pylgrymage
